# Class Graph

Class representing a computational graph. Provides functionality to construct and manage processing pipelines.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

addEdge addNode cleanupAllExecutions closeExecution destroy execute setEndNode setStartNode stopExecutor visualize

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new Graph(id: string): [Graph]()

Creates a new Graph instance with the specified ID.

#### Parameters

    * id: string

Unique identifier for the graph

#### Returns [Graph]()




## Methods

### addEdge

  * addEdge(src: Node, dst: Node, options?: [EdgeOptions](/interfaces/graph_graph.EdgeOptions)): void

Creates an edge between two nodes in the graph.

#### Parameters

    * src: Node

Source node

    * dst: Node

Destination node

    * options: [EdgeOptions](/interfaces/graph_graph.EdgeOptions) = {}

Edge options

#### Returns void




### addNode

  * addNode(node: Node): void

Adds a node to the graph.

#### Parameters

    * node: Node

Node to add to the graph

#### Returns void




### cleanupAllExecutions

  * cleanupAllExecutions(): void

Cleans up all active executions.

#### Returns void




### closeExecution

  * closeExecution(outputStream: [GraphOutputStream](./graph_graph_output_stream.GraphOutputStream)): void

Closes a specific execution.

#### Parameters

    * outputStream: [GraphOutputStream](./graph_graph_output_stream.GraphOutputStream)

Output stream of the execution to close

#### Returns void




### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this graph.

#### Returns void




### execute

  * execute(  
input: string | [AudioChunkInterface](/interfaces/common_types.AudioChunkInterface) | Record<string, string>[],  
executionId: string,  
): Promise<[GraphOutputStream](./graph_graph_output_stream.GraphOutputStream)>

Executes the compiled graph.

#### Parameters

    * input: string | [AudioChunkInterface](/interfaces/common_types.AudioChunkInterface) | Record<string, string>[]

Input data to execute the graph

    * executionId: string

Unique identifier for this execution

#### Returns Promise<[GraphOutputStream](./graph_graph_output_stream.GraphOutputStream)>

Promise resolving to the execution output stream




### setEndNode

  * setEndNode(node: Node): void

Sets a node as the end point for graph execution.

#### Parameters

    * node: Node

Node to set as the end node

#### Returns void




### setStartNode

  * setStartNode(node: Node): void

Sets a node as the starting point for graph execution.

#### Parameters

    * node: Node

Node to set as the start node

#### Returns void




### stopExecutor

  * stopExecutor(): void

Stops the graph executor.

#### Returns void




### visualize

  * visualize(path: string): Promise<void>

Visualizes the compiled graph and saves the visualization to a file.

#### Parameters

    * path: string

File path where the visualization will be saved

#### Returns Promise<void>
